Sentencas: The use of nanostructured interfaces and advanced functional materials opens up a new playground in the field of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: In this work, we present two all-ceramic thin-film heterostructures based on samarium-doped ceria and lanthanum strontium chromite manganite as promising functional layers for electrode application.
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The films were fabricated by pulsed laser deposition as bilayers or self-assembled intermixed nanocomposites.
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The microstructural characterization confirmed the formation of dense, well-differentiated, phases and highlighted the presence of strong cation intermixing in the case of the nanocomposite.
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties-solid/gas reactivity and in-plane conductivity-are strongly improved for both heterostructures with respect to the single-phase constituents under anodic conditions (up to fivefold decrease of area-specific resistance and 3 orders of magnitude increase of in-plane conductivity with respect to reference single-phase materials).
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: A remarkable electrochemical activity was also observed for the nanocomposite under an oxidizing atmosphere, with no significant decrease in performance after 400 h of thermal aging.
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: This work shows how the implementation of nanostructuring strategies not only can be used to tune the properties of functional films but also results in a synergistic enhancement of the electrochemical performance, surpassing the parent materials and opening the field for the fabrication of high-performance nanostructured functional layers for application in solid oxide fuel cells and symmetric systems.
Titulo: Nanostructured La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2 Heterointerfaces as All-Ceramic Functional Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications
